name: Desolation (Tenodru)
description:
Desolation is a simple 2D roguelike side-scroller where you play as a swordsman who must carve his way through hordes of skeletal enemies as he explores this desolate wasteland. 

Enemies drop coins, which you can use to upgrade your combat stats (accessed by pressing [ESC]).

This game is currently an early prototype I initially developed for a university project. I might plan to expand this game further into a full release in my free time, and if I do so, you can follow updates on the game and (my other works) on my website!
